/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Trees dot the sidewalks, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the road, each one a testament to the city's dynamic pace of life. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
